title: JAMES BEZEL, 3MM LAB WHITE SAPPHIRE GOLD RIVIÈRE NECKLACE
description:
NEW STONE SIZE: 3MM
Our most-worn bezel rivière in a new, daintier 3MM size. The James Bezel 3MM Rivière features lab-grown white sapphires in a bezel setting that outlines each stone with a slim border of 18k gold vermeil.
details:
Metal: 18k gold vermeil - a 2.5 micron layer of gold over sterling silver.

Setting: Bezel
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Stone Size: 3MM



15 inches, 13.02 CTW

 16 inches, 13.72 CTW

 18 inches, 15.52 CTW

What is Lab-Grown?
